Articles.Content: Yep what do you dream when ksp enters beta i dream of terraforming planets and leaving the solar system and going to other stars and one day leave the galaxy
I would like to think the completed career mode is all I would want for beta
i think career mode, i don't think there will be any of that terraforming you speak of.

I believe they said that stuff like terraforming would come in DLCs/Expansions rather then base game as it so far outside the original scope and might deter people by making them think the games learning curve is sharper then it really is.
I agree, get career mode, then we can start talking about stuff like terraforming, MP (yes, I said the m word), Proper Colonies, etc.

This game has been so well done so far that, would you believe it, I completely forgot this game was alpha. Anyways, I would love to see the ability to manipulate and move small planetary objects, like asteroids, around.
mining an asteroid belt could be lucrative in game. Dv requirements for the potential material return would be very low. probes to scan for deposits ect could be loads of fun.
I wholehartedly agree. Asteroid mining is one of the most wanted features for me. Another is science. Lots and lots of science-y stuff to do everywhere

I want to find lost technology from either an alien civilization (imagine finding NASA parts) or stuff from a previous rise into spaceflight and something knocked them back again. Maybe a heavy meteor shower that happens ever 50,000 years or so and it destroys their technology so they have to start again. Imagine finding an old, old plaque from ancient Kerbals and having to do a treasure hunt all over the Kerbal system.

Oooh... I know what Kerbals need more than anything.... SHOVELS and archaeology tools to examine dig sites on other planets. That would SOOOOOOOOOOOO make the game exciting, finding links on one planet that lead to dig sites on other planets. Maybe they find the lost Kerbal data that leads to new rocket engines and such. And they need some rocket tech that would help them get out of the system bow shock to a planet outside of the Kerbal system.

Ksp doesn't use the terms like alpha and beta like minecraft uses. Instead ksp is currently in a sandbox complete mode, if you don't what this means, it means that all the coding for future feature in the game is already there but the features are not. So there will be more stuff coming.
I just want an asteroid belt. MOAR ASTEROID BELT(S)!

I just want an asteroid belt. MOAR ASTEROID BELT(S)!

Because your trousers keep falling down and you end up mooning your asteroids instead?
I want to build rocket launchers and building ...buildings on other planets. :3

I would terraform Eve so that it'd have a thinner atmosphere

so that I could actually complete an ascent from it
Terraforming takes centuries, and you lose any ability to research the original planet. Not a fan. But I'd love an asteroid belt. So many things to see and explore!
Drop an orbital tether from Eve orbit... That would do the job...

I want a new API. One advanced enough that we could add our own aliens or have a KSSR/Kunited States cold war reenactment. Or perhaps someone will even make a trading system in multiplayer. When MP does come out, I vote we ALL play on the server sal_vager does, because nobody could get away with (let's face it, it's bound to happen) griefing.
